ComicInfo.Title: 進撃の巨人
ComicInfo.Summary: In a world where humanity lives inside cities surrounded by enormous walls due to the Titans, gigantic humanoid creatures who devour humans seemingly without reason, Eren Yeager joins the military to fight the Titans after his hometown is invaded and his mother is eaten.
ComicInfo.Imprint: 別冊少年マガジン (Bessatsu Shonen Magazine)
ComicInfo.Characters: エレン・イェーガー (Eren Yeager), ミカサ・アッカーマン (Mikasa Ackerman), アルミン・アルレルト (Armin Arlert)
ComicInfo.Teams: 調査兵団 (Survey Corps), 駐屯兵団 (Garrison Regiment), 憲兵団 (Military Police Brigade)
ComicInfo.Locations: シガンシナ区 (Shiganshina District), ウォール・マリア (Wall Maria), トロスト区 (Trost District)
ComicInfo.ScanInformation: Digital scan from original Japanese tankōbon
ComicInfo.StoryArc: The Fall of Shiganshina, Battle of Trost District
ComicInfo.MainCharacterOrTeam: エレン・イェーガー (Eren Yeager)
ComicInfo.Review: A groundbreaking manga that revolutionized the genre with its dark themes, complex world-building, and innovative storytelling. The right-to-left reading format enhances the traditional manga experience.
